title: Emily Site
description: Building a site to track adventures, goals, and memories.

home.description:
**Hi Emily!**

Here's my attempt to convince you that I am semi-competent at this tech stuff.  You know I like making my lists.  I built this so that we can keep track of different things in our relationship.  Here are some initial features:

1. A couple blog posts about our adventures/misadventures
2. A goals checklist
3. A counter for important days!
